questions.question: What war, not just out of those, but in general, do you think has been most transformative for the world?
How important is mortality, finiteness, the fact that this thing ends to the creative process?
Okay, this is humans only, or does it pass around from animals, in your view?
Another way of looking at it, this is, do you ever see the movie City of Angels?
Can you put into words the process of letting go, and clearing that channel of communication?
If we're looking at Bruce Springsteen's albums, it's kind of, well, what's the next album?
And you think it's possible to, as a writer, to have extreme confidence in yourself?
If you think about, if you're a writer, or any creative person, you're giving birth to something, right?
So I just hope as the future unfolds, that I'm open to it, you know?
